string.value: Oh~ You're the one that met up with our Roly Poly's at the Eos Tower for me! How can I help you here? Huh? Haha, of course, I did not forget the lunch box my daughter made for me. I'm just waiting for lunch so I can eat them! I'll see you around!

string.name: n0
string.value: Don't you want to make something? It's a piece of cake for me~

string.name: n1

string.name: name
string.value: Green Mesoranger

string.value: Did we ... miss our takeoff?

string.value: The Roswell Field is prone to aliens making apperances, so this place is under special constant watch. The attack is still on, so I suggest you and others not to get too comfortable in this place. I'll have to head back to the Sector for some more work, so I'll see you around!

string.name: name
string.value: Black Mesoranger

string.value: Hello! I'm #b#p2040018##k, in charge of a mission to prevent the aliens from invading this place. It seems like they have been acting up more lately. It's very dangerous around here, so I suggest you run back to the Omega Sector for safety.

string.name: d1
string.value: You're the one that helped me get rid of #b#o4230116##k here at the Coolan Field. It feels good to find someone like you here at a place where dangerous aliens are a common sight. I'm still investigating on the mastermind behind these aliens. I'm going up against yet another alien, so it's not easy...

string.value: Hey! You're the one that cleaned out the Eos Tower for me last time! How have you been? I'm so glad the number of monsters have generally decreased, and they aren't as wild as they were before. I really appreciate all your hard work. Oh well, hope you have a great day at Ludibrium!

string.name: d1
string.value: Hello~! Thanks to you, my dad got his appetite back. He really enjoys it. How can I help you today? Oh no!!! You shouldn't enter this place with your shoes on! I cleaned up this place just now, you know!!! If you don't have much else to do, then please come back some other time!

string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.value: Hi. I'm #b#p2041011##k, in charge of a special mission here. Have you seen an alien around here? Apparently they attract innocent strangers by sweet-talking to them, so please be aware of that.

string.value: Hello, there. I'm #b#p2041012##k of Omega Sector, currently in a secret mission to prevent the alien invasion here. I've been really busy these days taking care of important missions. This place is very dangerous, so I suggest you get out of here and go to a safer place.

string.value: You're back~ I've been getting up on time these days, and I'm never late on missions. I'm also glad the people upstairs are taking notice. It's all thanks to you. Now, I have something important to do, so please excuse me~

string.value: 引き返すなら今のうちだ。死に急ぐのは無謀者がすることだ。

string.value: コンペイ

string.name: n0
string.value: とうとうここまで来ちまったな。ほれ、上の奴さんも必死みたいだぜ

string.name: n1
string.value: シッ！静かに。オイラだってただ突っ立ってるんじゃないぜ。偵察中さ。

string.value: コンペイ

string.name: n0

string.name: d0
string.value: I'm #b#p2040029##k, and I've been sent here to see what's wrong with the Ludibrium Clocktower, but I can't seem to find any errors in this.

string.name: d1
string.value: You must have told #b#p2040002##k the Clocktower has been fixed. Hopefully the soldiers can trust the time now. Thank you so much for your hard work. I'll have to get back to work now. Please head back to Ludibrium, as this place is too dangerous a place to just hang out.

string.name: d0
string.value: Sup. I'm Roy, but my boys call me "The Mad Bunny". I hate Easter and I'm going to bring it down this year. There are two ways to help my gang, and you can help us out by giving us either the Easter Egg or the Golden Egg. Which one of them can you give us?

string.name: d1
string.value: Sup. I'm Roy, but my boys call me "The Mad Bunny". I hate Easter and I'm going to bring it down this year. There are two ways to help my gang, and you can help us out by giving us the Golden Egg.
